Get ESPN men's college basketball PBP data

Source: R/espn_mbb_data.R
espn_mbb_pbp.Rd

Get ESPN men's college basketball PBP data

espn_mbb_pbp(game_id)

Arguments

game_id

Game ID

Value

A play-by-play data frame.

Author

Saiem Gilani

Examples

# \donttest{
  try(espn_mbb_pbp(game_id = 401256760))
#> ── ESPN MBB Play-by-Play Information from ESPN.com ────────────── hoopR 1.7.0 ──
